attributes.action: refrain from using any cohesive intervention in resolving the Zimbabwean Situation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Zimbabwes problems are unique to indigenious Zimbabweans and international community, apart from fellow African states can never understand, the Zimbabwean situation, and if any cohesive action is taken against the Zimbabwean Govt, the reparcations can be dire to the intergrity of the West and the international community at large. The solution to this situation should be the lifting of all sanctions, which are affecting the general populace of Zimbabwe and not their intended targets.  The opposition is only being selfish towards its own people for calling on the continuation of these illegal sanctions.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
